GENERAL FEATURES.Business Features: Document Viewer, Pushmail  (Microsoft Exchange Active Sync), Word, Excel, Power Point, PDF, Neo Reader Barcode Scanner, eBook Reader
GENERAL FEATURES.Call Features: Conference Call, Speed Dialing, Hands Free, Loudspeaker, Call Timer, Call Divert
GENERAL FEATURES.In the Box: User Guide, Data Cable, Charger, Battery, SIM Tray Pin, Warranty Card, Handset

Multimedia.Video Player: Yes, Supports AVI, 3GP, MP4, MJPEG, Full HD

Camera.Other Camera Features: Snap Shots, Continuous Focus, Real-time Zoom, Time Lapse Mode, Shoot Stunning Videos, Panorama, Crop...Auto Focus, Zoom Level - 5, Brightness Level - 5, Multi-shot, Night Mode, Photo CLI

Internet & Connectivity.Bluetooth: Yes, v4, Supported Profiles (HFP 1.6, OPP 1.2, FTP, A2DP 1.2, DUN 1.1, HSP 1.2, AVRCP 1.3, HIDP 1.0)

Other Features.Important Apps: Gmail, AOL, Yahoo, Hot Mail, LG Email, Instant Messaging, Google Talk, Messenger, Google Apps, YouTube, Google Plus, Google Wallet, Google
Other Features.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Gyroscope Sensor, Accelerometer, Magnetic Sensor, Light Sensor

Warranty.Warranty Summary: 1 year manufacturer warranty for Phone and 6 months warranty for in the box accessories

Display.Other Display Features: Multi-touch, IPS Display, NM2 Wide Angle Technology
